prompts.value: Perfect! You can have whatever you want from our menu. What would you like to order?

speech:
You have allergy to $Allergies . Here is our menu including the allergies:

COFFEE
Americano (Allergies: Caffeine, Lactose) -- 3.00€
Cappuccino (Allergies: Caffeine, Lactose, Cacao) -- 4.00€
Macchiato (Allergies: Caffeine, Lactose) -- 4.25€
Espresso (Allergies: Caffeine, Lactose) -- 2.5€
Mocha (Allergies: Caffeine, Lactose, Cacao) -- 4.75€

HOT DRINKS
Hot Chocolate (Allergies: Cacao)  -- 4.00€
White Chocolate (Allergies: Cacao) -- 4.25€
Vanila Tea (Allergies: Vanila) -- 3.5€
Green Tea -- 3.00€

What would you like to order?
